cz.syntea.xdef.util

Class GenCollection

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.syntea.xdef.util.GenCollection

  • public class GenCollection
extends java.lang.Object
    Generates a xml document with collection of all given X-definitions.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods

    • Method Detail

      • genCollection

        public static org.w3c.dom.Element genCollection(java.lang.String[] sources,
                                                boolean resolvemacros,
                                                boolean removeActions,
                                                boolean genModelVariants)
                                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Create collection element from sources.
        Parameters:
        sources - array of source paths, wildcards are permitted.
        resolvemacros - if true then macros are resolved.
        removeActions - if true all irrelevant actions are removed.
        genModelVariants - if true generate alternate models if in the reference there exists an attribute redefinig type or occurrence (important for XML schema generation).
        Returns:
        element with collection of X-definitions.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if an error occurs.

      • genCollection

        public static org.w3c.dom.Element genCollection(java.io.File[] files,
                                                boolean resolvemacros,
                                                boolean removeActions,
                                                boolean genModelVariants)
                                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Create collection element from sources.
        Parameters:
        files - array of source files.
        resolvemacros - if true then macros are resolved.
        removeActions - if true all irrelevant actions are removed.
        genModelVariants - if true generate alternate models if in the reference there exists an attribute redefining type or occurrence (important for XML schema generation).
        Returns:
        element with collection of X-definitions.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if an error occurs.

      • genCollection

        public static org.w3c.dom.Element genCollection(java.net.URL[] urls,
                                                boolean resolvemacros,
                                                boolean removeActions,
                                                boolean genModelVariants)
                                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Create collection element from sources.
        Parameters:
        urls - array of source urls.
        resolvemacros - if true then macros are resolved.
        removeActions - if true all irrelevant actions are removed.
        genModelVariants - if true generate alternate models if in the reference there exists an attribute redefinig type or occurrence (important for XML schema generation).
        Returns:
        element with collection of X-definitions.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if an error occurs.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String... args)
        Call generation of a collection of X-definitions from a command line.
        Parameters:
        args - array with command line arguments:
        • -o file .......... output file
        • [-m .............. switch macros will be expanded]
        • -e encoding ...... name of character set
        • -i file [file1 ... [filen] ] list of input files (wildcards are supported)
